post.body: Your little brother sounds like my little brother...sometimes I just don't know what's going through their heads!?!?!
Heading to bed...worn out...g'night all!
Spending a quiet evening with Anna...I feel like I ran a marathon and just went to Walmart...ugh...surgery and sickness sucks...
I do believe it is naptime...even though I need to go to Walmart...dilema dilema...
Monday of recovery and watching Rachel Ray...Mike just came by to eat lunch. Pretty good day so far!
Spending a quiet evening home alone with Billy the cat. Looking forward to getting out and going to @NewSpring GVL tomorrow!
Anyone want to keep a recovering patient company tonight? Give me a text/call!!
Surgery went amazingly well! I didnt get sick at all which isnt normal for me. Recovering at my parents. Merry Christmas
Change of plans surgery at 8am tomorrow...
Surgery Wednesday @ 1220 Saint Francis Downtown
Update...appointment with surgeon at 330 today. And people are killing me with all this food!!!
Great morning at NewSpring GVL. Im feeling it though so staying home tonight. You all are in my thoughts and prayers!!!
I'm so ready for @newspring GVL tomorrow. I may be really sick and in pain but I'm gonna be there!!! I'm ready to see God work!
Headed to bed...after sleeping through Get Smart...meds are some serious stuff! G'night everyone!!
Gallbladder is going to have to come out.
headed to the hospital for my test on my gallbladder...will update later. and pray for me...I'm starving and can't eat til 2pm!!
Spent last night in the ER with Anna and Amanda and then Dad...Looks like my gallbladder is not doing it's job. Having a test done tomorrow
Tummy feels so awful...in bed for the evening...
Im so glad my moyfriend just called and woke me up...alost missed a great morning with NewSpring people!!
Having Christmas with Mike and the boys tonight
